title: Typecon 2006 - Boston, MA - August 9-13, 2006
content:
I just noticed that the SOTA typecon page here :

[http://www.typecon.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907042400/http:/www.typecon.com/ "http://www.typecon.com/")

... says that Typecon 2006 in Boston, MA will be on August 9-13, 2006.

Anybody know if they are going?

I am!

 [‹ Mark This Birthday on your calendar :-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907042400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16964 "Go to previous forum topic") [Best hair color for type designers ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907042400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/1676 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Eben Sorkin

comments.content:
Tamye has this thread going already: [http://typophile.com/node/14946](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907042400/http:/typophile.com/node/14946 "http://typophile.com/node/14946")

I should be there, like I said in that thread, I’m not sure if I’m going to volunteer or just go with a student pass.

Ah, yes. But now there are DATES.

;-)
Haha, fair enough! :-D

I plan to attend again since it is on the east coast. I had such a great time last year meeting everyone and learned alot too.  
The entertainment was good too—Yves dancing is a must see :-)

ChrisL

I missed the evening activities this summer cause I wasn’t 21 and was only volunteering. I know by the time next summer comes I’m going to want to just front the money and get the full experience, meet people too!
Rats, I was hoping it would be around the same time in July as previous years. I probably can’t go in August.
I hope you make it.
Boston is one of my favorite places. I’m glad to see TypeCon coming there, and I hope to be there, too.
Man, I love Boston and miss it. Should be a good time since I’ll be of drinking age at the time I come back to visit!
Just as long as you have cab money or a designated driver. There are few enough of us Typophiles as it is! ;-)
I shall be there with bells on ... and [Shram stickers](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907042400/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/shram_h_paparazian).

Steven - did you invent/produce Shram?

What about Hrant? Will you be there?
I’ll be there. Wouldn’t _dream_ of missing it.
Eben, who’s Steven?
He means Stephen, as in Stephen Coles.
I plan on being there, too. NYC was a fun time and I’m looking forward to hanging out in Boston.
Yes, sorry about the typo Stephen!
Eben - I only _wish_ I had invented Shram.

I will try very hard to be there.

—-

jlt : [http://www.hewnandhammered.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907042400/http:/www.hewnandhammered.com/ "http://www.hewnandhammered.com") : rnrmf!
I will probably be there. Certainly August works better for me than July.

I hope to be there - but hope is about it for now. :-/

hhp

I’m fairly certain I’ll be there, at least for now.

Jordan

Hope to see you there!

ChrisL
I’ll be there — don’t wanna miss Yves dancing this time! :-)
I might choose AtypI this year. Lisboa is such a beautiful place. The ultimate thing would of course to make it na double ;-)
I am going to Boston! I made great friends and contacts last time - hope to make more this time around. Can’t wait!

I attended Typcon 2003 in Minneapolis and loved it. Missed Typcon 2004 as I traveled to Baku to celebrate my fiance’s and my 2003 engagement with her family. Last summer we were busy with our American wedding (after a long two year wait for her residency requirement to expire and the immigration process to get her over here). Now we are expecting a daughter in mid to late May:)

So long story short, I don’t think I will be at this year’s Typcon. I look forward to when my wife and I can attend a Typcon together... we made a deal after Typcon 2003 that the next Typcon I attend she would come with me:)

Hi all, new to this thread. I was just google’ing aimlessly and came across this great site. Just to say I will be travelling over to Typecon as well. really looking forward to it as I have not been before. hope to meet and make some friends as well as I am going over (I’m Irish) on my own. Should be good to meet people who are also self confessed typocondriacs as well:)

got my tickets, ready to go. just a few weeks away. where’s the “i’m so psyched for typecon” thread? this one is looking a little wan.

—-

jlt : [http://www.hewnandhammered.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907042400/http:/www.hewnandhammered.com/ "http://www.hewnandhammered.com") : rnrmf!
